item.title: Secure (TLS) gRPC services with LKE
item.description: NOTE cert-manager is a better solution to what follows. I wrote about deploying Secure (TLS) gRPC services with Vultr Kubernetes Engine (VKE). This week, I’ve reproduced this deployment using Linode Kubernetes Engine (LKE). Thanks to the consistency provided by Kubernetes, the Kubernetes programming is almost identical. The main differences are between the CLI’s provided by these platforms. Both are good. They’re just different. I’m going to include the linode-cli commands I’m using in this post as I found it slightly more quirky.
